website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty cart provides exceptional quality and impressive weight capacity for buyers seeking a durable product at a cheaper price.
pros: Shelves are lipped to keep belongings and items safely inside
Able to hold up to 300 pounds
cons: Smaller size than many customers anticipated

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and sturdy cart.
customer_reviews.text: After years of not having one of these carts at my workplace I finally talked my boss into buying a larger version of it for me to use there. I use it multiple times every day and love it. A few months ago my family was getting ready to move, so I ordered this one for us. It was very handy for the move and we continue to use it to transport groceries , and is a pretty good work bench. I can’t imagine being without one of these at work or at home.
customer_reviews.author: John Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great cart, hard to maneuver with only 2 swivel wheels
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a wonderful product from a trusted brand. Purchased for a PTA to use at school when moving around lots of different things. My issue is that it only came with two swivel wheels, and the instructions said to place them at the handle. It is very difficult to maneuver this way, unless you plan to pull it everywhere rather than push! I would prefer if all 4 wheels were swivel, but am seriously considering bringing it back home to switch the swivel wheels to the 'front' of the cart instead of the handle side.
customer_reviews.author: kpalm

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid garage utility cart
customer_reviews.text: Good garden cart and for use in a large garage. The size makes it difficult to maneuver tight corners. It took 2 people to assemble with more tools than shown in directions. The directions are vague and need improvement. Casters roll well and shelves are sturdy with moderate weight of 100lbs on each shelf. I found this $100.00 cart by Rubbermade awkward to maneuver. For our use we prefer a similar cart by a different company offered at Amazon for $75.00.
customer_reviews.author: J Myrner

customer_reviews.title: Uncommonly good value on a widely recognized commercial product
customer_reviews.text: Uncommonly good value on a widely recognized commercial product. This arrived, I put it together in less than 15 minutes, the worksurface is slightly oversized which is exactly what I wanted, everything is over built, it is of commercial quality, I don’t know why it is so much cheaper than other comparable Rubbermaid products. However, I don’t care, because I got one, it’s great, and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: DrJohnsonCom

customer_reviews.title: A Pain to Put Together but WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: The setup was difficult for two older folks. Four washers were missing from the package (which we had to find in our "shop," and we had to drill out many holes because large screws would not go through. In all, we used a drill for holes, ratchet, long-handled screwdriver, and rubber mallet. Luckily.we had those items but every household does not. It does work great. I'm using it at a 55+ affordable housing facility for groceries and Food Bank deliveries. Plan on sharing it with whoever needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie C. Warren

customer_reviews.title: New home for house plants
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I dropped it a star is because of the cost. It wouldn't surprise me if I could turn it upside down and stand on it and I weigh 240. I like it well enough that I just bit the bullet (cost) and bought a second one. Now all of my plants can stay out in nice weather and easily come in when it is too cold outside. Bend over and load the plants once then just push the cart in and out. No worries about it getting wet during watering or when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Southern VetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for future use later. When I tried to assemble it, I discovered the wrong set of wheels and hardware were included so could not assemble. Also one corner of the tray was broken off. Was past return period, and Rubbermaid was no help. Total junk.
customer_reviews.author: Klee

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are near worthless, but the item seems ok.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are near useless in my opinion. Multiple references to incorrect countif the number of screws will have you rereading and counting multiple times. Each leg is labeled with an embossed “C” or “D” but the instructions reference different letters all together. The product seems sturdy, but it is clear that there is a major disconnect between manufacturing and the people who write the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Sleestak13

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help keep me organized during a diy home renovation. It’s super sturdy and has help up to everything. Tools, chunks of demolition trash, paint cans etc can all be moved around. The tires are rugged and it’s narrow enough to fit easily through doorways. Overall the quality is excellent and it will probably last for decades.
customer_reviews.author: hjm_50

customer_reviews.title: After five years of regular use, it's still like new; but buy 16 of your own 1/4" screws
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy enough for heavy items but still light enough to handle easily. Every apartment complex should have a few of these. The 16 screws that connect the casters, lower piece, and legs were too thick so I had to buy 16 screws (and matching hardware) that were 1/4" instead of the 5/16" that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Franks

customer_reviews.title: Problems with the wheels
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough. However, this cart only came with 2 swivel casters, not 4 as the description leads you to believe. The other 2 wheels are fixed and do not turn. This makes it difficult to maneuver the cart empty or loaded. It's too much trouble to send back as the box it came in was ripped open. Luckily, the screws, nuts, and washers came in a sealed bag so no parts were missing. I will have to go and buy another set of 4 swivel casters.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Belle

customer_reviews.title: Not a 24" wide cart as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This cart is only 16" wide. When you look at the description on the website, you'll see 3 different dimensions given. I saw the 24" description first and ordered it based in that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: The equipment cart comes in a flat box and requires complete construction, but given 15 minutes the job was done and the cart ready for use. I worried at first that a plastic cart would not hold the amount of test equipment that I need to put on it, but with well over 200 lbs loaded on it there is no problem. Its easy to wheel around and we can take our test gear to the equipment that we are testing. I should have got one of these years ago! I'm fairly certain that I'll buy a second cart in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Phil-thom

customer_reviews.title: Very handy.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's perfect for transporting heavy items around the house and garage and bringing in the groceries. I'm a senior citizen getting very tired of carrying heavy items. This cart makes life much easier. It's ugly as sin though - very industrial looking. And, the assembly instructions were minimal. Thank goodness my husband is experienced in assembling such things. I don't know that I could've done it without him.
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: Parts incorrect and no response from Rubbermaid
customer_reviews.text: Order had three 'C' legs and only one 'D' leg rendering the cart useless to put together since they fit a specific way. So I would have needed two 'D' legs and two 'C' legs to make this work. Hit up Rubbermaid twice, no response. Better to risk COVID and go into home depot and make sure the parts are correct before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Noone

customer_reviews.title: Good Added Work Surface For My Office
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an extra work surface for my office. Mostly I store papers, binders, and folders on it for whatever report I'm working on so that they don't completely overrun my desk. Not great looking, of course, but highly functional, seems well-made and quite durable. I would prefer four swiveling wheels for easier steering in my small office, but that's not a biggie considering the price - it's reasonably maneuverable with just the two swiveling wheels and two fixed (non-swiveling) wheels. One caution: assembly may be a bit much for some. If you're not handy with tools or don't have someone around who is, or don't have the right tools handy, I wouldn't recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Collins

customer_reviews.title: General Contractor's opinion:  Rubbermaid holds up to the toughest sites!
customer_reviews.text: General Contractor: Durable, great cart! We have many of these, and will continue to buy them as we need them. We use Rubbermaid products on commercial projects all the time. I could be wrong, but I do believe there are very similar carts out there at a cheaper rate. A cart that looks a lot like this Rubbermaid cart, is the Husky cart. Do your research, and yes you're welcome! Have a great day.
customer_reviews.author: CParas

customer_reviews.title: Great carry! Commercial quality
customer_reviews.text: Great piece! Easy to put together very sturdy the only thing I would change would be to get a lock on the wheels so that it doesn’t roll away if you plan on parking it somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: ASW

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and sturdy cart
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little cart. I am a leg amputee and I use it in the basement. I use a mechanics scoot chair on wheels to scoot around the basement and I can remove groceries or what ever from the trunk, scoot them over to the stair lift and bring them up into the house. I use it to transport tools or anything to heavy or bulky for me to handle in any other way. It is built very sturdy and rolls extremely well. After I have had it, I could not do without it.
customer_reviews.author: George Albright

customer_reviews.title: Love this cart
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart, my husband and I are getting older have a tough time carrying in groceries, we keep the cart in the garage and push it out to the drive way un-load the car in one trip. We take right to the kitchen put the groceries away and push the cart back to the garage. Used it a lot this Christmas bring in tree stand, ornaments, reefs, unloaded our Christmas tree right on to it brought into the house. It rolls so easily every where including in the grass, used it to put decorations on the outside of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Always shop here first

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cart ... be careful in assembly
customer_reviews.text: These carts are handy and strong. Just be careful when assembling, because there are two types of legs, and they have to be put in the proper slots. Same for the wheels ... two types that have to be mounted properly. The instructions (which are only pictures, with little text) only vaguely hint at this. At first, I couldn't figure out what was going on. Other than that, the cart is great. It's a bit pricey, but I got lucky and bought mine when they were on sale in a "Lightning Deal".
customer_reviews.author: tparker24

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality Cart. I am happy with the wheels and the construction. Make sure you put both swivel wheels on the handle side if you need to get it into tight spots. This Cart is fairly skinny and with a lot of weight on the top you must be sure to turn it from the end with the swiveling wheels or you could risk a tip over if loaded just right. Will not work well on a gravel drive and with not work well on your yard unless it is very hard. It works fantastik for the intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Shopfloor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cart
customer_reviews.text: Rubbermaid comes through again. Easy to assemble. Sturdy and excellent construction. Use 1/2 inch ratchet socket to assemble instead of screwdrivers for stronger holds.
customer_reviews.author: DM Rome

customer_reviews.title: Such a handy utility cart.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother but I wish I had room to store it at my house because it’s super handy. Very easy to assemble and super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: tf

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased to be used to move art and school materials within the house. It is a fairly large cart. The assembly was easy and everything fit together perfectly. The wheels are easy on the floor and rolls without noise or binding. The wheels nearest the handle pivot, while the wheels in the front are fixed. While the color is not attractive, it is functionaI. I recommend this cart.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Sylva

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy and functional cart. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Was a little but concerned after reading a few reviews here about some missing hardware, but Amazon has a great return policy so I pulled the trigger. The package came complete and I was able to assemble it in about 20 minutes. The cart rolls smoothly and is sturdy. I am using mine as a cart for auto detailing supplies. Could easily handle heavier duty tasks. Only thing I wish it had is a wheel lock for keeping the thing in place easily in my driveway. Free 2-day shipping through Amazon Prime rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: strong small handy cart
customer_reviews.text: These carts are the best way to go for small projects or shop use. I found Amazons price on these at $120 couldn't be beat elsewhere. Simple design is better than the more expensive Rubbermaid. The casters are a bit undersized if your going over pneumatic hoses or large power cords. I modified this one with 8" pneumatic swivel casters from Harbor Freight. I had to also add a plywood base however to move the wheels slightly farther away so they wouldn't touch and to gain a bit more stability but in the end its a very functional cart and I will have it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: A. Design

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Good materials and heavy duty so I don't need to worry about it holding up to a workout with heavy items. Wheels are good size and quality so they don't get hung up rolling or turning.
customer_reviews.author: Ratdaddy

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: use it under a portable propane grill. Like the idea of putting the rotating wheeels on the front, rather than the rear as directed. What I need is two more swiveling wheels. :-)
customer_reviews.author: J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid makes good products fine choice.
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to assemble and provides an easy way to move tools and equipment to the job. I use it as a rolling tool and parts carrier when fixing car, etc.
customer_reviews.author: W. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great tool cart
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional mechanic and I purchased this for use in the shop to hold car parts and tools for whatever I'm servicing, it is FAR superior to those cheap metal carts, the durability and rigidity are outstanding, and it has so far resisted every chemical in a car.
customer_reviews.author: DREWSASTER

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket!
customer_reviews.text: I have osteoarthritis of the spine, and carrying groceries from the garage to the kitchen (1 level) was too much. With this easily assembled cart, I can roll it out to the car, load the groceries, and roll it to the kitchen in 1 trip with very little effort. It's just the right size, easy to handle, not heavy itself, but rated for 300 lbs. It's made my shopping trips easy! I have found many other uses for the cart around the house, such as getting the laundry to the washer and back from the dryer, and moving empty boxes and trash out to the trash can. It's easy to clean. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit perfectly, no parts left over - no parts needed - get your 1/2" socket and a big slotted screwdriver to build the3 base - a #3 Phillips to attach the top shelf. It would be nice if the slotted screws were Phillips, Torx or Hex - easier to handle 'blind' when assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality Rubber Maid product
customer_reviews.text: Solid and sturdy cart. Easy to assemble and feels like it will hold up for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Track1033

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice cart. Easy to use. Instructions for assembly totally wrong but easy to figure out. Notice the letters don't match the diagram. I purchased this cart to help me after having a total knee replacement. I use it to move all kinds of items. Sturdy. Used it for moving the chlorine for my pool that was 60 lbs. no problems
customer_reviews.author: JP of Sacramento

customer_reviews.title: Works well, annoying assembly
customer_reviews.text: Rubbermaid stuff can be quite a challenge to assemble (very nice way if of putting it). The directions are sufficient, but could be better. Someone with large hands will definitively use choice words especially when anchoring the top on. All that aside, once assembled, it has (and is) taking the beating. It is holding up well against daily use and abuse. Definitely recommended, but assembling it may get interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and was a breeze to put together. We use it to haul around a 80 lbs. Shaved ice machine for parties, etc. Very sturdy and perfect for what we needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: KelleyMom

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid does it again. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product very useful. Using it during kitchen reno and will use more. Wish it was light blue but only had black.
customer_reviews.author: sienna

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Utility Cart
customer_reviews.text: Stong and rolls beautifully! Easy assembly and perfect for moving items.
customer_reviews.author: hatsbyanne1942

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cart
customer_reviews.text: Use this in milking parlor and is holding up very well
customer_reviews.author: Meama

customer_reviews.title: Saved my back!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy! I'm a 59yo lady with a power screwdriver and I put this cart together in 15 minutes. Fits easily through doorways and I can haul all the things that used to make my back ache. Laundry, garbage, books and clothes to the thrift store, whatever, from anywhere in my house to the car. No problem! Hard rubber wheels make pushing it effortless and quiet. Very happy. Would buy again in a minute!
customer_reviews.author: Desert Jin

customer_reviews.title: Light weight - easy to clean - Beautiful color - very sturdy This ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight - easy to clean - Beautiful color - very sturdy This is the second cart like this I have purchased. The first one I have had for several years and it is still going. I have had change the casters but only after years heavy workloads.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Fugate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, and of very high quality. This cart will hold a ton of stuff if necessary, and the tires are non-marking and quiet. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Herrington

customer_reviews.title: I like this cart
customer_reviews.text: I like this cart. The only minor complaint I have is when putting it together a few of the screws go through slots instead of holes. The slots tend to spread when tightening down the screws which might come apart after time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Cart review
customer_reviews.text: The cart is almost what I needed. My only gripe is I wished the top was as secure as the bottom is. The legs are bolted to the bottom with 4 bolts on each leg while the top is just held in place with one screw holding the top in place with the top of the leg held in place with a round top. Other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Works great, we are currently renovating our kitchen and are using this handy cart to move microwave and other small appliances around the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great little cart for our repair shop. I can put all parts on the cart and wheel it out to the mechanics bay and he has everything within reach. I have loaded it with about 250 lbs on top and 200 on bottom and it rolls just fine. This is our second one, wanted to make sure it would do the job before ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: dp3619

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart, I use it for my car care equipment. Holds everything from buckets to towels and everything in between to wash or detail your car. Very durable and well built. Super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hauling stuff around work
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hauling stuff around work, this is the third one I have purchased. One for me, one for a friend, and one for someone else who saw it. Everyone loves it from moving computer stuff to paint cans. Keeps your hands free and you can move more than you can carry! One set of wheels turns the cart, you can put them on the front or back.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: This is a great, sturdy cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, sturdy cart. The only thing that isn't my favorite is the steering. Only the front wheels pivot so it can only be steered from the front. It's just a little easier to have all of the wheels pivoting so I don't have to lift and shift the back of the cart depending on where I am with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cart
customer_reviews.text: Good product, shipped as promised. Good tip is to put free spinning wheels on front. Makes cart easier to drive when pushing cart from handhold end. I live on multi-level property, and when entertaining, I use this cart to transport plates, dishes, food, etc, from upper level kitchen. I just drive this cart down the driveway to the poolside entertainment area.
customer_reviews.author: Bags & Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy cart with large wheels
customer_reviews.text: A nice sturdy cart with large enough wheels. Goes together pretty easily. Cheap zinc plated hardware - I'm going to spray paint the nuts and bolts to keep them from rusting in our salty air in the Florida Keys. Otherwise, this thing should last forever in my shop, or I may use it around home cause I'm getting lazy.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Kropf

customer_reviews.title: Light weight yet durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great utility cart. I have bought 6 over the last 2 years, as they are great. Light weight, solid, durable, and easy to build. Recommend...
customer_reviews.author: ECH

customer_reviews.title: Super cart!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is just what we needed around our house to tote around the things that become a burden to carry too far. We use it frequently to move the laundry baskets to and from the utility room. It helps us clean and sort household clutter. We use it every 2 or 3 days. It has saved my back and helped so much! Quick to assemble and fu to York!
customer_reviews.author: Klr

customer_reviews.title: Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Strong cart, Should last a long time. Assemble wasn't total beginner but shouldn't be a deal breaker if your not afraid to use a hammer to get things set. States so in the instructions so I went at it and that's what it needed.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: When you buy one you may buy 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart for my work shop. It works great. Did not know how much I would use this cart until I bought it. The only problem I am having is my wife keeps taking it and using it for her stuff. I use it to hold projects and bring tools outside to work. Very strong cart. May need to buy another one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Westwood

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Strong
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love, it does exactly what you expect it to do. It's super sturdy, the wheels are heavy duty, and I expect this to last a very long time. I knocked 1 star off for price. Seems a tiny bit expensive for such a seemingly simple item. I want to stress again that this thing feels very sturdy and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Sal Berlingeri

customer_reviews.title: Niceeeeee cart.
customer_reviews.text: I like this cart. Rolls nicely. Got it thin so it fits through the doorways easily. Wheels seem solid - 2 fixed and 2 swivel. I might write an even better review had i had it for the past year but just got it and it appears well made for my intended purposes so that's great!
customer_reviews.author: Good Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great cart for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: We have had one of the full size Rubbermaid carts for years and it has held up extremely well. I wanted a smaller cart to carry classroom materials from my office to the room. It works great, is super durable, and does not take an engineering degree to assemble. It steers well and rolls easily across different flooring and sidewalk materials.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great cart for my work!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I needed a durable, sturdy and mobile cart to help move my tools and repair parts from my truck to my job site and save me many trips back and forth. Also I usually visit multiple work sites in a single day. This cart is great and it fulfills everything I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: rob49

customer_reviews.title: I bought three of these for my building! they ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for my building! they get used all the time and no more ugly shopping carts in the garage!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen R Norris

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy & Solid Service Cart
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my husband for various uses in the garage and household. All parts & hardware arrived as expected and in the time frame specified. One bolt was stripped so a run to the local hardware store was necessary. The material of the cart is extremely sturdy and very solid once put together. We anticipate this service cart receiving lots of use!
customer_reviews.author: MinM.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a rugged cart and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MFORD

customer_reviews.title: I love this cart
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart. I purchased it for our church for our cafe' area. It has great maneuverability for what we needed. When assembling I switched the swivel wheels. It makes more sense to me that when you push the cart that the swivel wheels be up front not in the back. This way you can easily turn the cart in the direction you want to go while holding onto the hand grips.
customer_reviews.author: martha

customer_reviews.title: Durable storage
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, holds quite a bit and really easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: PHX"T"

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: bought this cart not too long ago, so far..i am enjoying it..and its light to put in the back of the truck.. for the price...I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: lemec

customer_reviews.title: Good cart
customer_reviews.text: Bought a cheap one should have just bought this in the first place
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Fink

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to transport groceries, cases of water, and other bulky items into the house from my car. Very sturdy and much easier to push than the little cart I had. It did take me 20 minutes to put it together. I put the swivel wheels under the handles and it works well in that position.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon F.

customer_reviews.title: Great cart for heavier usage.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy cart. Perfect for heavier usage. Wheels roll smoothly, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cart to use in our home and our customers ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cart to use in our home and our customers too. We are in construction and this is so darn handy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: Listing incorrect
customer_reviews.text: My issue is the listing is incorrect. The small cart has a 300# capacity, the listing says 500#.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paid for the name, shop around.
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy cart that rolls well. Good size for 2 1/2 car garage needs. Bought this from amazon on sale for $93. Week later saw virtually the same cart with a better/handle tray w/towel bar ad for Northern Tool for $80 without the rubbermaid name.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Their may be hope for America. Made in the USA. Quality still exists. Would purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: David Ecker

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a busy food service business where we have wet floors and heavy boxes. Works great, holds up as expected. Obviously over time it does wear. But we have repeat purchases as we are pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Roundman's Smoke House

customer_reviews.title: A handy cart.
customer_reviews.text: We moved to a condo and this was great for moving and now for shopping, or moving things from the garage to the unit. Easy to guide and is very quiet. This also holds a lot. I have used it to move things around the condo, stage boxes to unpack or keep project supplies handy.
customer_reviews.author: Joan E. Schacht

customer_reviews.title: Im the owner of a construction company and love this baby
customer_reviews.text: Im the owner of a construction company and love this baby, strong as heck, and light, and really helps keeping tools organized and mobile on the jobsite
customer_reviews.author: Dejan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well proportioned
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well proportioned. Perfect size for toting garage tools and garden supplies. BTW: Contrary to the installation instructions, I installed the swivel casters on the front (away from the handle side) as I prefer to 'drive' in 'shoping cart' mode.
customer_reviews.author: TGI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase - exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart for our church and it is now the most used item there. It is strong, sturdy and quiet - definitely helps us get ready for events and setting up of gatherings with the least amount of steps and strain. I put this together with just a few tools. I want to order another one! It's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta D.

customer_reviews.title: These carts are sturdy and they last
customer_reviews.text: These carts are sturdy and they last. We use them for electrical service work/install. Load all your tools and equipment up on them and then you can push the carts around the work area. Very sturdy and very well made. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: Wheel base too narrow
customer_reviews.text: The wheel base is way too narrow. If you are using this on a smooth, level commercial floor with a light load it may suffice. I bought this to use for projects around the house to move tools around instead of always going to/from the garage, with the narrow wheel base it tips over almost under its own weight (tools on top that is). I am going to keep it for another project (Solar generator I am working on) but went with a wider cart for garage/house projects.
customer_reviews.author: ECHO444

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty, won't tip easily.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Rolls well. Perfect height. I have a SonoFresco coffee roaster and this is just right for roasting on the deck. The roaster sits atop, with the propane tank on the lower shelf. It's sturdy and tip resistant.
customer_reviews.author: M&PK

customer_reviews.title: Nicey sized and very strong
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit of time to assemble. Several of the bolt holes ran a bit small, just used the hammer and drove the bolts through. If you are not using a socket wrench, you may become frustrated with assembly. The cart is strong and nicely made. It will be used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zak

customer_reviews.title: Is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment ever! Very strong, but easy to manage. Not only makes it easier for me to transport all my supplies at once, but is also the perfect working table. As a party entertainer I have to carry a lot of stuff and I used to have to go many times to my car to bring things over to the event site including a table. Now I load everything on my cart and use the cart as the table. It is perfect, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: sandra medina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly , no paperwork or instructions included , yet very easy to assemble ...Great price at $99.... Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I hope the wheel mounts don't rust as I am using it outdoors. The hardware is chrome plated. A similar less costly version can be had at Harbor Freight. Structural foam is strong, durable and rust proof. It also looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Utility cart
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without it. Sturdy, smooth, would hold an elephant. Easy to assemble. Best purchase ever. But make sure you put the back wheels on the back, and not the front.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Everts

customer_reviews.title: High quality and heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable and very easy to roll. Love using it in my garage. And it's narrow enough to roll inside the house too. Great gig quality wheels too.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good Utility carts
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Rubbermaid for years. Good Utility carts.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for groceries
customer_reviews.text: I use it to move large containers and bags from the garage to the kitchen. It means all my bagged goods are easy to reach and move about in the kitchen. The heavy containers of drinks are no longer a chore to bring in. There is almost never enough counter space to place all the grocery bags while unpacking. The cart solves that problem and moves from the refer to cabinets many feet away. It may be lazy, but after shopping I don't like frustration. RUBBERMAID has always been a great product. I haven't seen any deterioration in quality in the "China" era. It was a 8 minute assembly and was idiot proof. AY
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to hold craft materials and move around as needed. Easy to assemble. Would buy again! I was not compensated for this review.
customer_reviews.author: PeeceeWizard

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Ordering the Rubbermaid brand is a wise choice. Their stuff is always best in class. That applies to this cart too. I use it in the garage as a battery tender caddy and on the deck as a bar cart.
customer_reviews.author: bon vivant

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: was way too small listed incorrect dimensions, so I returned
customer_reviews.author: G D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together but the bolts don't stay in
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but the bolts don't stay in. Maybe I put them on wrong, but we had to super glue them to keep thiem in place.
customer_reviews.author: Woof2020

customer_reviews.title: Solid and dependable
customer_reviews.text: You see these things in workplaces all the time, they seem pretty bulletproof. When they were offered as a lightning deal I grabbed a couple for the garage. A big help in moving and organizing things.
customer_reviews.author: Basil Fawlty

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy plastic cart
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy plastic cart. Easy to put together. Not too much to say about a plastic service cart, but the casters roll well, it feels very sturdy even with heavy items on it. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Corruptgarage

customer_reviews.title: nice little cart and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: nice little cart and very easy to clean, even after knocking over an uncapped 5qt jar of gear oil in it and not noticing overnight. cart feels sturdy and hasn't given me any issues
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart
customer_reviews.text: These Rubbermaid carts are great in our laboratory environment and would be great in most other uses. Much better price than the usual scientific supply houses.
customer_reviews.author: Fallswine

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart! It is strong and durable for my auto parts store. It steers easily and can be maneuvered around the store without any problems. It holds heavy items without bowing in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cole

customer_reviews.title: saves back and makes the job at hand easier and finish faster
customer_reviews.text: Personal great cart that holds up well, under hard use. Have it by my des at school carting boxes and other docs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  E

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cart. We use this for business purposes and it has held up very well. PROS: -Casters are quality -Easy to assemble -Holds a good load without tipping
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Commercial Products 2-Shelf Utility/Service Cart, Small, Lipped Shelves, Standard Handle, 500 lbs. Capacity, for Warehouse/Garage/Cleaning/Manufacturing (FG9T6600BLA)
product_meta.description: Size:Small| Style:Lipped Shelf| Configuration:Standard HandleThe Rubbermaid Commercial Products 2-Shelf Utility/Service Cart is constructed of sturdy structural foam that will not dent, chip, or peel. 2 shelves support up to 500 lbs. of materials throughout the facility use space. Rounded corners protect walls and furniture. This rolling cart has 5" non-marking swivel casters for lightweight maneuverability. With handle compartments for additional storage, molded fittings for rolled supplies, an easy-access lipped bottom shelf, and a lipped top shelf, this is a versatile and indispensable utility cart for any facility. Availible with lipped shelves for secure storage, or flat shelves for oversized loads.
feature_bullets: ADVANCED MATERIAL CONSTRUCTION: High density structural foam construction makes this 2 self rolling cart sturdy, lightweight, and maneuverable; it also won’t rust, dent, chip or peel

PERFECT FOR THE HEAVIEST LOADS: This service cart with wheels is perfect for transporting materials, supplies, and heavy loads in almost any environment; Structural foam provides more durability than other materials, offering 500 pounds of storage weight capacity

EASY MANEUVERABILITY: Ergonomically designed push cart handle provides optimum hand placement and push height improving control and worker safety; Navigate warehouses, classrooms, loading docks, or stock rooms with ease

SPECIALLY DESIGNED WHEELS: 5 inch non marking thermoplastic rubber swivel casters absorb shock, provide floor surface protection, and quiet operation; Excellent on linoleum, tile, terrazzo, wood, smooth concrete, and carpet

PEERLESS CUSTOMIZATION: Molded in storage compartments, holsters, hooks, and notches, customizable fittings, and easy access bottom shelf make space for all your tools and keep them close at hand; Plus, built in V notch holds pipe securely for safe cutting

MADE IN USA: Recognized as a “Brand of the Century”, Rubbermaid is 1 of only 100 companies named as having an impact on the American way of life; Rubbermaid Commercial Products are made in Winchester, Virginia
1 YEAR WARRANTY: Rubbermaid warrants to the original owner that this product is free from defects in material and workmanship for a period of 1 year from the date of the original purchase
DIMENSIONS: 34.25 inches x 17.38 inches x 31.5 inches
